TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IResourceUrlGenerator

summary.span: 定義設計工具主應用程式必須實作的方法，以提供內嵌資源的 URL 參考查閱。

span.span: Defines the method that a designer-host must implement to provide URL reference look-up for embedded resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 2.0 版讓您能夠從控制項的組件擷取內嵌的資源，例如控制項。ASP.NET version 2.0 provides the ability to retrieve embedded resources from an assembly for controls, such as the control. 在執行階段，內嵌資源的 URL 可以使用來擷取方法的類別。At run time, the URL to the embedded resource can be retrieved using the method of the class. 若要提供設計階段表示從組件中產生的資源 URL，設計工具的主機可以提供實作的服務介面。To provide a design-time means for generating a resource URL from an assembly, designer hosts can offer a service that implements the interface. 如需詳細資訊：For more information: - 在使用中的當地語系化的資源，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Page Resources Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0936b3b2-9e6e-4abe-9c06-364efef9dbbd)。On using resources in localization, see [ASP.NET Web Page Resources Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0936b3b2-9e6e-4abe-9c06-364efef9dbbd). - 在 使用內嵌的資源，請參閱[NIB： 如何： 可用的資源，設定 Web 伺服器控制項中的屬性值](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8e0e5c0-1958-422b-b4f5-ebe63f6c45cb)並[如何： 擷取資源的值以程式設計的方式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7a06d512-6fc3-40ca-9cb6-7f41d1a9fa28)。On using embedded resources, see [NIB:How to: Use Resources to Set Property Values in Web Server Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8e0e5c0-1958-422b-b4f5-ebe63f6c45cb) and [How to: Retrieve Resource Values Programmatically](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7a06d512-6fc3-40ca-9cb6-7f41d1a9fa28). - 在控制項設計工具，請參閱[ASP.NET 控制項設計工具概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1d5a99d7-0a72-403e-812e-2c1ab595c810)。On control designers, see [ASP.NET Control Designers Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1d5a99d7-0a72-403e-812e-2c1ab595c810). 介面具有單一方法，方法，會傳回指定的資源類型和名稱資源的 URL 參考。The interface has one method, the method, that returns a URL reference to a resource given the resource type and name.

related.span: ASP.NET 控制項設計工具簡介

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetResourceUrl (Type type, string resourceName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetResourceUrl(class System.Type type, string resourceName) cil managed
public: System::String ^ GetResourceUrl(Type ^ type, System::String ^ resourceName);
abstract member GetResourceUrl : Type * string -> string

param.name: type
param.span: 包含內嵌資源之組件中的型別。

span.span: The type in the assembly that contains the embedded resource.
The name of the resource to retrieve.

summary.span: 傳回用於設計階段時組件中的內嵌資源 URL 參考。

span.span: Returns a URL reference to an embedded resource in an assembly that is used at design time.

returns.span: 對資源的 URL 參考。

span.span: The URL reference to the resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在執行階段，方法會傳回資源的 URL。At run time, the method returns a URL to a resource. 類別會定義用來載入內嵌的資源的 HTTP 處理常式。The class defines the HTTP handler that is used to load embedded resources. 在設計階段方法的設計模式和設計工具主應用程式服務實作中，會傳回 URL 的委派，會偵測到類別。At design time, the method of the class detects design mode and delegates to the designer-host service implementation, which returns a URL.
